name: 4 the Ascent
description:
• Game Jam 2019
  • theme: cyberpunk
  • ART by @margawart
  • OST by Kali

In the year 2052, the world is ruled by 4 ruthless Corporations. But the status quo is about to change for the first time in decades when a woman, on a mission to get her revenge, vows to cut off the head of the snake.

Will she keep her resolve strong under the crushing weight of this world? Or will she crumble and fall, like many before her?
